nodes.text: The Poison Pit was a cantina located in the city of Jiguuna on the planet Nal Hutta during the Cold War. Ula Vii met Jet Nebula there in 3643 BBY. Bounty hunters Braden and Jory were killed in the cantina by the Mandalorian bounty hunter Tarro Blood at the beginning of the Great Hunt of 3643 BBY.
